articles.description: Scotland qualify for Euro 2024 without kicking a ball as Norway's loss to Spain secures a top-two finish in Group A for Steve Clarke's men.
articles.title: Scotland reach Euro 2024 as Spain beat Norway

articles.description: It has not been a fun year for England rugby fans, but they finally got some joy back in Marseille on Sunday.
articles.title: England shred nerves but return joy to fans in Marseille

articles.description: England's defeat by Afghanistan in the World Cup is one of the great shocks, and leaves Jos Buttler's side with little wriggle room says Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: Afghanistan defeat one of World Cup's greatest shocks - Agnew

articles.description: Wales produce a stunning performance to beat Croatia and reignite their hopes of qualifying automatically for Euro 2024 in sensational fashion.
articles.title: Wales beat Croatia with Wilson double to reignite hopes

articles.description: South Africa keep the defence of their title alive with a thrilling quarter-final victory over France in one of the greatest matches in World Cup history.
articles.title: South Africa beat France by one point in thriller

articles.description: Watch highlights as England suffer a shock 69-run defeat to Afghanistan in Delhi at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: England suffer shock defeat by Afghanistan

articles.description: Arsenal and England forward Beth Mead calls her return to football "special" following 11 months of "torture" after a serious knee injury.
articles.title: 'Amazing to be back' - Mead's delight at return

articles.description: Watch the key moments from Sunday's Rugby World Cup quarter-finals as England knock out Fiji, while defending champions South Africa stun France.
articles.title: England and South Africa reach semis while hosts knocked out

articles.description: Scotland manager Steve Clarke hails his player for reaching successive European Championships and doubts they "will fully realise the significance of their achievement yet".
articles.title: Fans helped Scotland become 'feared once again' - Clarke

articles.description: Jordan Henderson says he will play for England as long as he can and has to take criticism "on the chin" after being booed by his own fans
articles.title: 'I have to take it on the chin' - Henderson on boos
